content.webTitle: Me and my Travels: Nick Frost, actor

fields.headline: Me and my Travels
fields.bodyText: I'll never go back to ... Oslo. We spent Christmas there one year. It was closed and there was no snow so I was pretty pissed off. The luxury I can't live without is ... My phone. It's a link with home and I play Championship Manager on it. If I'm lying by a pool I see if I can steer West Ham to glory! My top travel tip is ... Use public transport. Wherever you go it gives you a sense of what it's like to live there rather than just rampaging through. When I'm travelling I always miss ... British telly. When you're abroad it's never the same. My most memorable meal was ... Falafels in Israel from the street stalls in Tiberius on the Sea of Galilee. I never travel without ... A pen and a notebook. I never use them but it feels right to bring them. I'm not that interested in ... Space travel. Or cruising: you're trapped, there's no place to hide and I can only shove so many quoits. My idea of paradise is ... A really, really nice suite in a boutique hotel, with a spa and an amazing beach. My favourite hotel is ... The Chedi in Muscat. It's amazing. The Soho Grand in New York is great too. I try not to ... Text my mates while I'm on holiday, but I can't resist the odd text or photo message. I always bring back ... A glossy book from museums or galleries I've visited. My ideal travelling companion is ... Chris, my girlfriend. We both get up early. We both enjoy lying on the beach and driving around having a look at places, and we like to go for a little ramble! The thing I hate about travel is ... American officials. · Nick Frost stars in 'Man Stroke Woman' at 10.30pm on Sundays on BBC3. In January he will be in 'Hyperdrive' on BBC2
